entry.title: GitHub Hexo报错汇总
entry.content:
GitHub+Hexo

  1. $ hexo init

    网络问题初始化失败，删除所有hexo安装包以后重新输入$ npm intall -g hexo-cli失败

    尝试$ npm intall -g --foece hexo-cli成功, --force 可以暴力覆盖

  2. npm set registry[http://registry.npmjs.org/](http://registry.npmjs.org/)

    可以重置链接

  3. https://www.notion.so/7b7de4fac9224d1e9e95cec6e64855c3

  4. Hi, sorry, i must hv done something wrong.
    i tried to point, which i hv just bought from you, to But now when i type, the browser shows a

    结果应该是Domain提供商反应比较慢，现在好了

  5. hexo deploy not found git
    是因为没有装$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save

  6. 优化过程中出现TypeError Cannot read property ‘replace’ of null
    实在是悲剧，找不到原因，只好$ hexo init 从头来过，哭哭
    切记每步操作完一定要$ hexo g&d

  7. FATAL Cannot read property ‘replace’ of null
    是因为config文件里的url: 后面被删掉了

  8. hexo-更改本地路径
    a. config.yml文件中配置如下：
    b. hexo s -p 5000

  1. 未完待续

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
